\\/D:\\/repos\\/stride-translations\\/pt: <g1>Raycasting<\/g1> traces an invisible line through the scene to find intersecting <g2>colliders<\/g2>.
<g1>Raycasting<\/g1> traça uma linha invisível através da cena para encontrar intersectando <g2>colliders<\/g2>.
<g1>Raycasting<\/g1> traces an invisible line through the scene to find intersecting <g2>colliders<\/g2>.
This is useful, for example, to check which objects are in a gun's line of fire, or are under the mouse cursor when the user clicks.
Isso é útil, por exemplo, para verificar quais objetos estão na linha de fogo de uma arma, ou estão sob o cursor do mouse quando o usuário clica.
This is useful, for example, to check which objects are in a gun's line of fire, or are under the mouse cursor when the user clicks.
It ignores entities that have no collider component.
Ele ignora entidades que não têm componente de colisão.
It ignores entities that have no collider component.

To use a raycast, in the current <g1>Simulation<\/g1>, use <x1\/>Simulation.Raycast<x2\/>(xref:Stride.Physics.Simulation.Raycast(Vector3, Vector3, CollisionFilterGroups, CollisionFilterGroupFlags, bool)).

Para usar um raycast, na corrente <g1>Simulation<\/g1>, use <x1\/>Simulation.Raycast<x2\/>(xref:Stride.Physics.Simulation.Raycast(Vector3, Vector3, CollisionFilter Grupos, CollisionFilterGroupFlags, bool)).

To use a raycast, in the current <g1>Simulation<\/g1>, use <x1\/>Simulation.Raycast<x2\/>(xref:Stride.Physics.Simulation.Raycast(Vector3, Vector3, CollisionFilterGroups, CollisionFilterGroupFlags, bool)).
For an example of raycasting, see the <g1>Physics Sample<\/g1> project included with Stride.
Por exemplo, veja o projeto <g1>Physics Sample<\/g1> incluído no Stride.
For an example of raycasting, see the <g1>Physics Sample<\/g1> project included with Stride.
This code sends a raycast from the mouse's screen position:
Este código envia um raycast da posição da tela do mouse:
This code sends a raycast from the mouse's screen position:
public static bool ScreenPositionToWorldPositionRaycast(Vector2 screenPos, CameraComponent camera, Simulation simulation)
bool estático público ScreenPositionToWorldPositionRaycast(Vector2 screenPos, CameraComponent câmera, Simulação)
public static bool ScreenPositionToWorldPositionRaycast(Vector2 screenPos, CameraComponent camera, Simulation simulation)
\/\/ Reconstruct the projection-space position in the (-1, +1) range.
\/\/ Reconstrua a posição do espaço de projeção no intervalo (-1, +1).
\/\/ Reconstruct the projection-space position in the (-1, +1) range.
\/\/    Don't forget that Y is down in screen coordinates, but up in projection space
\/\/ Não se esqueça que Y está em coordenadas de tela, mas em espaço de projeção
\/\/    Don't forget that Y is down in screen coordinates, but up in projection space
\/\/ Compute the near (start) point for the raycast
\/\/ Compute o ponto próximo (start) para o raycast
\/\/ Compute the near (start) point for the raycast
\/\/ It's assumed to have the same projection space (x,y) coordinates and z = 0 (lying on the near plane)
\/\/ Assume-se que tenha as mesmas coordenadas de espaço de projeção (x,y) e z = 0 (de pé no plano próximo)
\/\/ It's assumed to have the same projection space (x,y) coordinates and z = 0 (lying on the near plane)
\/\/ We need to unproject it to world space
\/\/ Precisamos de desprojetá-lo para o espaço mundial
\/\/ We need to unproject it to world space
\/\/ Compute the far (end) point for the raycast
\/\/ Compute o ponto distante (fim) para o raycast
\/\/ Compute the far (end) point for the raycast
\/\/ It's assumed to have the same projection space (x,y) coordinates and z = 1 (lying on the far plane)
\/\/ Assume-se que tenha as mesmas coordenadas de espaço de projeção (x,y) e z = 1 (de pé no plano distante)
\/\/ It's assumed to have the same projection space (x,y) coordinates and z = 1 (lying on the far plane)
\/\/ We need to unproject it to world space
\/\/ Precisamos de desprojetá-lo para o espaço mundial
\/\/ We need to unproject it to world space
\/\/ Raycast from the point on the near plane to the point on the far plane and get the collision result
\/\/ Raycast do ponto no avião próximo ao ponto no avião distante e obter o resultado da colisão
\/\/ Raycast from the point on the near plane to the point on the far plane and get the collision result
There are multiple ways to retrieve a reference to this <g1>Simulation<\/g1> from inside one of your <g2>ScriptComponent<\/g2>:
Existem várias maneiras de recuperar uma referência a este <g1>Simulation<\/g1> de dentro de um de seu <g2>ScriptComponent<\/g2>:
There are multiple ways to retrieve a reference to this <g1>Simulation<\/g1> from inside one of your <g2>ScriptComponent<\/g2>:
The recommended way is through a reference to a physics component, something like <g1>myRigidBody.Simulation<\/g1> or <g2>myCollision.Simulation<\/g2> as it is the fastest.
A maneira recomendada é através de uma referência a um componente de física, algo como <g1>myRigidBody.Simulation<\/g1> ou <g2>myCollision. Simulação<\/g2> como é o mais rápido.
The recommended way is through a reference to a physics component, something like <g1>myRigidBody.Simulation<\/g1> or <g2>myCollision.Simulation<\/g2> as it is the fastest.
Or through <g1>this.GetSimulation()<\/g1>, note that the <g2>this<\/g2> is required as it is an extension method.
Ou através de <g1>this.GetSimulation()<\/g1>, note que o <g2>this<\/g2> é necessário como é um método de extensão.
Or through <g1>this.GetSimulation()<\/g1>, note that the <g2>this<\/g2> is required as it is an extension method.
